A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Holy crap!  Disney you had one job to do and you failed.  All you had to do was preserve the legends and legacies handed to you on a silver platter.  How can you take a franchise with millions and millions of fans already established and give it the middle finger???\n\nYou screwed the pooch.  Speaking of pooch\, anyone else want to punch Rose and her rabbit horses?
